remarks: Formula building theorem for support restrictions: operator with left annihilator.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ suppssov1 as of 28-May-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
suppssov1OLD.s $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. D |-> A ) " ( _V \ { Y } ) ) C_ L ) $.
suppssov1OLD.o $e |- ( ( ph /\ v e. R ) -> ( Y O v ) = Z ) $.
suppssov1OLD.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> A e. V ) $.
suppssov1OLD.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> B e. R ) $.
suppssov1OLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. D |-> ( A O B ) ) " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ L ) $.
$d B v $.
$d O v $.
$d R v $.
$d Y v $.
$d Y x $.
$d Z v $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph v $.
$d ph x $.
